Functions

rs_result rs_whole_run (rs_job_t *job, FILE *in_file, FILE *out_file)
 

Function Documentation

rs_result rs_whole_run ( rs_job_t *  job,
FILE *  in_file,
FILE *  out_file 
)

Run a job continuously, with input to/from the two specified files. The job should already be set up, and must be free by the caller after return.

Buffers of rs_inbuflen and rs_outbuflen are allocated for temporary storage.

Parameters
in_fileSource of input bytes, or NULL if the input buffer should not be filled.
Returns
RS_DONE if the job completed, or otherwise an error result.
